|vendor_id = 10b7 |device_id = 9050 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = DF63C905-TX |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |ethoui = 00:60:97
|chip1 = 3Com;40-0336-004; |chip2 = National Semiconductor;DP83840A; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|linuxdriv = 3c59x |windriv =
|eth_ports = 1 |eth_speed = 100MbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = <!-- Support automdix --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Support Jumbo frames -->
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = Has Boot ROM socket |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =

|powledcolor = none |connactled = yellow |spdledcolor = green (separate) |leddupcolor = none |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This particular card has an Assy. No. of ''03-0104-004'' and revision of ''B''. The unit's S/N is ''6HH180A0DF''.
The '''3Com''' logo, all the model / product info, "(C)1996 ALL RIGHTS RESERVED", and "10/100BASE-TX Ethernet Adapter" is silkscreened on the top of the card. :The '''3Com''' Ethernet controller is marked with... :*'''Parallel Tasking''' :*'''Performance''' :*'''3Com 40-0336-004''' :*'''9644K 01398555''' :*'''LUCENT 40-03364''' :"FAB 02-0104-001 REV A", and <small>"COVERED BY ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING PATENTS: 5268899, 5307459, 5434872"</small> is etched onto the back of the bottom layer of the board. :*<small>[https://www.google.com/patents/US5268899 Patent '''US 5268899 A''': Apparatus for generating pseudo-random numbers in a communication system, or other system involving a shared resource]</small> :*<small>[https://www.google.com/patents/US5307459 Patent '''US 5307459 A''': Network adapter with host indication optimization]</small> :*<small>[https://www.google.com/patents/US5434872 Patent '''US 5434872 A''': Apparatus for automatic initiation of data transmission]</small> :The device is using the '''National Semiconductor''' :*DP83840A - 10/100 PHY :*DP83223V - ''Twister'' Twisted Pair Transciever
[[Category:English Documentation]]
